WorkItem.ClosedComment: +1% hit is implemented.  When switching from to and from Draenai I see the value of hit change by the expected amount.
WorkItem.Description:
To reproduce (Rawr version 4.3.2.0):
1.  Load attached profile for a frost DK
2.  Optimize
 
Observed:
a.  Hit rating is reforged to 5% from gear (which combined with 3% from talents and 1% from racial is total of 9%, or 1% over the yellow hit cap.)
b.  Buffs -> All does not contain a listing for Heroic Presence
 
Expected:
a.  Hit rating is reforged to 4% from gear 
b.  Buffs -> All contains Heroic Presence showing value of 1% hit
 
Notes:
1.  I do not know if this affects all specs, or just DKs, or just frost DKs.
WorkItem.Summary: Heroic Presence (draenai racial, +1% hit) not implemented

FileAttachments.FileName: Alathas Draenai Frost DK with no Heroic Presence.xml

Comments.Message: I thought the it was properly coming from the racial base stats.  But I'll take a look.

just to add something on this issue, while a DW dk will only need 5% from gear (4% for draenei) for yellow hit, take in account the DW talent doe not affect spell so depending on the weight of the dmg howling blast can still miss because you'll still be about 2-3% away from spell cap.
